dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating participant-independent motor imagery classification, consisting of EEG recordings from participants performing kinesthetic motor imagery tasks.
dcterms:title: Motor Imagery Dataset

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for motor imagery tasks, used in multiple studies to analyze BCI performance and psychological predictors.
dcterms:title: Motor Imagery Dataset (used in multiple papers)
